Test Name: Endometrial Stromal Tumor (EST) FISH for JAZF1, PHF1, YWHAE Rearrangements
Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue blocks or unstained slides
Purpose: To detect rearrangements of JAZF1 (7p15), PHF1 (6p21.32), and YWHAE (17p13.3) genes in endometrial stromal tumors via FISH.
Container: FFPE tissue block or glass microscope slide
Equipment: Fluorescence microscope, FISH probes (JAZF1, PHF1, YWHAE), slide pretreatment kit, denaturation/hybridization system, buffer solutions and DAPI counterstain
